## FormState type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type FormState<TFieldValues extends FieldValues> = {
    isDirty: boolean;
    isLoading: boolean;
    isSubmitted: boolean;
    isSubmitSuccessful: boolean;
    isSubmitting: boolean;
    isValidating: boolean;
    isValid: boolean;
    submitCount: number;
    defaultValues?: undefined | Readonly<DeepPartial<TFieldValues>>;
    dirtyFields: Partial<Readonly<FieldNamesMarkedBoolean<TFieldValues>>>;
    touchedFields: Partial<Readonly<FieldNamesMarkedBoolean<TFieldValues>>>;
    errors: FieldErrors<TFieldValues>;
};
```
**References:** [FieldValues](./react-hook-form.fieldvalues.md)<!-- -->, [DeepPartial](./react-hook-form.deeppartial.md)<!-- -->, [FieldNamesMarkedBoolean](./react-hook-form.fieldnamesmarkedboolean.md)<!-- -->, [FieldErrors](./react-hook-form.fielderrors.md)
